name: Sumudu
short_description:
Sumudu makes developing customizable cloud based (Saas) products a breeze. Most of the products that are in the market are targeted toward particular domain/market segment (which might make sense in most cases) hence, product owners won’t get to explore opportunities that might exist in other domains. Besides, in order to meet user requirements, it’s evitable that product need to customized or extended. This becomes very difficult if product’s architecture doesn’t support required level of flexibility.
Sumudu, aims to fill in this requirement by providing a framework which allows enough flexibility to define/customize domain model of the system and relevant user interfaces during the runtime.
summary: Sumudu makes developing customizable cloud based (Saas) products a bre
